title: TFS to Azure DevOps Migration
description: Migrated source control, build pipelines, and work tracking from legacy TFS to Azure DevOps, improving team velocity and CI/CD capabilities.
iconSvg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M7.5 21L3 16.5m0 0L7.5 12M3 16.5h13.5m0-13.5L21 7.5m0 0L16.5 12M21 7.5H7.5'/></svg>

title: Cloud-Native Application Rewrite
description: Modernized on-premises applications to cloud-native architecture using Azure Front Door, APIM, Service Bus, App Services, and Functions.
iconSvg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M3 15a4 4 0 014-4h1a5 5 0 019.9-1.5A4.5 4.5 0 0120 19H7a4 4 0 01-4-4z'/></svg>

title: DevOps Engineering Leadership
description: Led DevOps practices including PR reviews, quality assurance, user story writing, and technical mentorship to elevate team standards.

title: Automated Testing
description: Implemented unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using Azure DevOps Test Plans and automated test suites to enhance code quality and reliability.
iconSvg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M3 15a4 4 0 014-4h1a5 5 0 019.9-1.5A4.5 4.5 0 0120 19H7a4 4 0 01-4-4z'/></svg>

title: Secure & Efficient CI/CD Pipelines
description: Integrated Veracode, Checkov, and TFLint into CI/CD to enforce security and compliance early.
iconSvg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M12 3l8.485 4.243a2 2 0 01.879 2.379l-3.03 9.09a2 2 0 01-1.9 1.288H7.566a2 2 0 01-1.9-1.288l-3.03-9.09a2 2 0 01.879-2.379L12 3z'/><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M9 12l2 2 4-4'/></svg>

title: Azure announcements RSS reader
description: Built an RSS reader to surface Azure announcements and EOL alerts directly to the team.
iconSvg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='1.5' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M4 4a16 16 0 0116 16M4 11a9 9 0 019 9M6 18a2 2 0 11-4 0 2 2 0 014 0z'/></svg>

title: Terraform best practices & automation
description: Implemented reusable modules, policy-as-code, and automated drift detection to improve reliability.
